text: Aethrodiscus is a genus of African orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Aethrodiscus transversalis. It was first described by Embrik Strand in 1913, and has only been found in Central Africa. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Taxa named by Embrik Strand
title: Aethrodiscus
